node.display_long_description:
Play poker like a pro, Poker VR is the only app to feature both multi table tournaments and cash games.  

Main features: 
- Easily see where your friends are playing, join their table or invite them to play with you!
- Most expressive avatars built for reading tells with growing customisations  
- Built for the quest, environments and avatars look sharp and clear 
- Play poker just like in real life, knock to check, throw your cards over the line to fold etc. 
- Feel like you are in a casino and not just at one table
- Lose hours making chip stacks and doing chip tricks. Poker VR features physics-based gameplay at the table.  
- Multi table tournaments with automated table balancing and live leaderboard. Tournaments support 100s of players at the same time. 
- Scope all casinos before joining a table. View where your friends are playing, their chip stack, and more.
- … and much much more!

nodes.title: Poker VR is now buttery at 90 hz!
nodes.body_text: v0.3.6 now supports 90hz and also enables breaking chip stacks!

node.reviewDescription:
Hi, I’ve been playing this game for a couple weeks now and it’s really fun if you get a good lobby and most of the time you do but occasionally you’ll be playing a game in a nice chilled out lobby and someone will just join going all in every single time before even seeing the flop and making that whole lobby virtually unplayable. Another situation I had about a week ago was that one guy entered a lobby and instantly started verbally attacking another player for no reason. Yes you can mute and freeze avatars but when a person is as vile as that guy was, we should have tho option to vote as a lobby to kick them out.
Another thing that I wish you could add is an age limit or tables specifically for kids, there are so many young children in this game who go around shouting and disturbing the beautiful, calm atmosphere you guys have created with the scenery and the music. Of course not all the kids in the game are like this but a vast majority are and it’s just a shame really. 

But overall this is a great poker game and I love being able to sit down at a copper table and just relax and play some poker with my friends and other interesting people online, I have met so many interesting people through this game! It is so beautiful and honestly my favourite thing to sit down to after a long day at work or in classes, thanks for making it so nice and relaxing. So despite the things I mentioned, I’d still recommend this game since it is fun to play and depending on your timing, you’ll likely get to chat with some cool people.

On a seperate note, sorry if this would be too difficult to add but it would be really cool if this gam allowed us to use the built in hand tracking on the oculus quest and quest 2?
node.reviewTitle: Please add a vote to kick option

developerResponse.body: Thanks for the well written and thoughtful review! We agree on most things and currently we are working on more moderation features like the one you mentioned. We recommend playing at silver tables and above for more serious players.

website_page_meta.description:
Play poker like a pro, Poker VR is the only app to feature multi table tournaments and cash games. 

Playing poker with friends was never more fun and social. Stimulated gaze tracking, facial expressions and full hand presence makes reading tells even more fun. Want to enjoy poker as a sport? Join 100s of other players in daily tournaments to hone your skill and prove to your friends that you are the best!
website_page_meta.title: Poker VR - Multi Table Tournaments · Oculus Quest
